items.title: Linux screen recording
items.summary: For example, on Debian/Ubuntu: sudo apt-get install ffmpeg Once installed ffmpeg, you are able to start screen recording with this simple command: ffmpeg -f x11grab -s wxga -r 25 -i :0.0 -qscale 0 recording.mpg Hit CTRL+C when you need to stop the recording (saved in recording.mpg) From https://andreafortuna.org/2019/09/20/how-to-record-screen-on-linux-from-command-line/ details
items.content_html:
For example, on Debian/Ubuntu:

sudo apt-get install ffmpeg

Once installed ffmpeg, you are able to start screen recording with this simple command:

ffmpeg -f x11grab -s wxga -r 25 -i :0.0 -qscale 0 recording.mpg

Hit CTRL+C when you need to stop the recording (saved in recording.mpg)

 

 

From https://andreafortuna.org/2019/09/20/how-to-record-screen-on-linux-from-command-line/ details

items.title: Self-Signed Cert
items.summary: OpenSSL Ubuntu sudo apt install openssl Pre-Compiled OpenSSL CentOS / RedHat sudo yum install openssl Chocolatey choco install openssl.light -y Mac Homebrew brew update brew install openssl echo 'export PATH="/usr/local/opt/openssl/bin:$PATH"' >> ~/.bash_profile source ~/.bash_profile https://blog.miniasp.com/post/2019/02/25/Creating-Self-signed-Certificate-using-OpenSSL
items.content_html:
OpenSSL

Windows Linux
Git for Windows built-in OpenSSL

Ubuntu

sudo apt install openssl
Pre-Compiled OpenSSL  

CentOS / RedHat

sudo yum install openssl

Chocolatey

choco install openssl.light -y

Mac

Homebrew

brew update

brew install openssl

echo 'export PATH="/usr/local/opt/openssl/bin:$PATH"' >> ~/.bash_profile source ~/.bash_profile

https://blog.miniasp.com/post/2019/02/25/Creating-Self-signed-Certificate-using-OpenSSL

items.title: Windows Server Related
items.summary: Active Directory Make assignments to other admins to manage certificate templates in a multidomain forest. create a group in Active Directory and add that group to the security properties of the CA server in the Certificate Authority console Enterprise CAs must be domain members and…
items.content_html:
Active Directory

Make assignments to other admins to manage certificate templates in a multidomain forest. 

create a group in Active Directory and add that group to the security properties of the CA server in the Certificate Authority console

CA

Enterprise CAs must be domain members and are typically online to issue certificates or certificate policies

common security best practice in a two-tier hierarchy CA design

The issuing CA servers are placed in different geographical locations.

 

Print Server migration process

Run the printbrm -b command on old one,

like 08 R2 (PRT01) to 12 R2 (PRT02)

printbrm -b command on PRT01

 

Hyper-V

Hyper-V server has two physical disks installed,
Disk 1 is a C: drive that hosts the Windows system files, and
Disk 2 is a D: drive that has no data.
Need to connect the D: drive to a newly created VM using a pass-through disk configuration. What is true about the D: drive?

  • The physical disk must be in a RAID 6 configuration.
  • The physical disk must be reformatted.
  • The physical disk must be offline.
  • The physical disk must use iSCSI.

 

IIS

IIS server host the corporate site, which is accessible only by company computers. You need to configure this website to use SSL. You obtain a certificate to install on the server. Into which certificate store should you import the server's certificate?

Personal under Local Computer

GPO

Group policy objects are not being applied to domain controllers because the Default Domain Controllers and Default Domain group policies corrupt.

run in a command prompt to recover them

Dcgpofix.exe

 

Storage

set up a storage area network that makes use of iSCSI storage.

then install the iSNS Server service feature on Windows Server 2012 R2. Why do you need this feature?

  • to provide discovery services of iSCSI devices [Ref: https://thesolving.com/storage/how-to-install-and-configure-a-isns-server-on-windows-2012-r2/#]

items.title: git cheatsheet & FAQ
items.summary: create a connection between a local and remote repository git remote add new git remote add origin Remark: git remote add, new added connection can be named origin or new The only constraints, although it is not documented AFAIK, is that the connection name needs…
items.content_html:
create a connection between a local and remote repository

git remote add new
git remote add origin

Remark: git remote add, new added connection can be named origin or new

The only constraints, although it is not documented AFAIK, is that the connection name needs to be acceptable to git-check-ref-format, and it cannot be repeated

list of remote repositories and their URLs

git remote -v

after starting work on a new feature and creating new files in the working directory related to it, the customer determined the feature was no longer required. What command can be used to remove the untracked files from the working directory

git clean -f

what command creates a near-exact copy of the

what situation can occur when attempting to combine branches containing changes to the same piece of code
